comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Greetings from 'Lanta, Frenz. Sounds like it's hotter there than here. It's been blessedly overcast since I arrived Sunday. Humid but not killer-hot. Atlanta's okay, but they evidently have some sort of weird esthetics-based laws on the books... Cops told me to get my shirt back on during my morning run down Andrew Young International Blvd. today. Kidding of course... or am I? The design conference is great; lots of good advice, etc.. I expect to come back with mad design skills, will be anxious to try them on one of Greg's projects. Of course now I'll have to charge him more...
